content:
# The nearest stone position is confirmed to be at (-14.5, -14.5), which aligns with my intended target for placing the stone furnace.
# Given that my player position is still reported as (0, 0), it indicates that the movement commands are not functioning as expected.

# To resolve this, I will attempt to move incrementally closer to the stone patch again, ensuring I stay within the maximum distance limit for placing entities.

# Moving to a position that is closer to the stone patch, I will try (-14.0, -14.0) again.
move_to(Position(-14.0, -14.0))  # Attempting to move closer to the stone patch.
